about_the_game:
In this humorous and unique simulation game, you take on the role of an unusual protagonist - a tree! Roam through the city, experience the freedom of movement and explore a world that lies at your roots. But that's not all. As a tree, cause chaos and influence your surroundings in a whole new way.

Be a Tree in the City

Climb buildings, discover hidden places and enjoy the unusual perspective of an urban environment. The demo offers a first insight into the special game mechanics that give you unimagined freedom and creative fun.

Features of the Demo

  • Be a tree

  • Explore a city

  • Throw people, cars or not

  • Meet a variety of events

  • Meet TreesaurusRex?

  • Watch squirrels make dirtymirtydingdongs

  • Climbing houses like treederman, and throw the people there to save them, of course

  • and more.. way more... something like stripclub more

Are you ready to tear the city from its roots?

Be a tree, be, The Tree.

name: Tree Simulator 2.0 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Experience the freedom of being a tree and making the city unsafe in Tree Simulator 2.0! Chaos and fun await you in this humorous demo!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
